content.question:
A sop to Cerberus

Cerberus haec ingens latratulatratus, -us, m.: barking, howl regna trifaucitrifaucis, -e: having three throats

personat adverso recubans immanis in antro.

Cui vates horrere videns iam colla colubris

melle soporatam et medicatis frugibusfrux, frugis, f.: fruit offamoffa, -ae, f.: cake

5 obicit. Ille fame rabida tria guttura pandenspando, -ere: spread; open

corripit obiectam, atque immania terga resolvit.

Aeneid 6.417-422

Translate the passage above as literally as possible.
